entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 14.
